skills.title: System Programming
skills.description: I developed strong system programming skills, encompassing C/C++, Verilog, and Assembly, with a focus on Compilers, Operating Systems, and Computer Organization.

skills.title: Artificial Intelligence
skills.description: While producing the research "Using Action Recognition to Crack reCAPTCHA," I comprehensived Machine Learning and Computer Vision through the Stanford CS229 and other self-learning.

skills.title: Full-Stack Development
skills.description: Developed full-stack development skills by tackling real-world projects, including my work on the Taiwan Sustainable Campus Project and building my own website

skills.title: Data Mining
skills.description: Developed data mining skills through a comprehensive Introduction to Data Mining course and applied them in impactful course projects
